addTagsToResource.description: Grants permission to add tags to an ElastiCache resource

authorizeCacheSecurityGroupIngress.description: Grants permission to authorize an EC2 security group on a ElastiCache security group

batchApplyUpdateAction.description: Grants permission to apply ElastiCache service updates to sets of clusters and replication groups

batchStopUpdateAction.description: Grants permission to stop ElastiCache service updates from being executed on a set of clusters

completeMigration.description: Grants permission to complete an online migration of data from hosted Redis on Amazon EC2 to ElastiCache

copySnapshot.description: Grants permission to make a copy of an existing snapshot

createCacheCluster.description: Grants permission to create a cache cluster

createCacheParameterGroup.description: Grants permission to create a parameter group

createCacheSecurityGroup.description: Grants permission to create a cache security group

createCacheSubnetGroup.description: Grants permission to create a cache subnet group

createGlobalReplicationGroup.description: Grants permission to create a global replication group

createReplicationGroup.description: Grants permission to create a replication group

createSnapshot.description: Grants permission to create a copy of an entire Redis cluster at a specific moment in time

createUser.description: Grants permission to create a Redis user for Redis engine version 6.x and onwards

createUserGroup.description: Grants permission to create a Redis user group for Redis engine version 6.x and onwards

decreaseNodeGroupsInGlobalReplicationGro.description: Grants permission to decrease the number of node groups in global replication groups

decreaseReplicaCount.description: Grants permission to decrease the number of replicas in a Redis (cluster mode disabled) replication group or the number of replica nodes in one or more node groups (shards) of a Redis (cluster mode enabled) replication group

deleteCacheCluster.description: Grants permission to delete a previously provisioned cluster

deleteCacheParameterGroup.description: Grants permission to delete the specified cache parameter group

deleteCacheSecurityGroup.description: Grants permission to delete a cache security group

deleteCacheSubnetGroup.description: Grants permission to delete a cache subnet group

deleteGlobalReplicationGroup.description: Grants permission to delete an existing global replication group

deleteReplicationGroup.description: Grants permission to delete an existing replication group

deleteSnapshot.description: Grants permission to delete an existing snapshot

deleteUser.description: Grants permission to delete an existing user and thus remove it from all user groups and replication groups where it was assigned

deleteUserGroup.description: Grants permission to delete an existing user group

describeCacheClusters.description: Grants permission to list information about provisioned cache clusters

describeCacheEngineVersions.description: Grants permission to list available cache engines and their versions

describeCacheParameterGroups.description: Grants permission to list cache parameter group descriptions

describeCacheParameters.description: Grants permission to retrieve the detailed parameter list for a particular cache parameter group

describeCacheSecurityGroups.description: Grants permission to list cache security group descriptions

describeCacheSubnetGroups.description: Grants permission to list cache subnet group descriptions

describeEngineDefaultParameters.description: Grants permission to retrieve the default engine and system parameter information for the specified cache engine

describeEvents.description: Grants permission to list events related to clusters, cache security groups, and cache parameter groups

describeGlobalReplicationGroups.description: Grants permission to list information about global replication groups

describeReplicationGroups.description: Grants permission to list information about provisioned replication groups

describeReservedCacheNodes.description: Grants permission to list information about purchased reserved cache nodes

describeReservedCacheNodesOfferings.description: Grants permission to list available reserved cache node offerings

describeServiceUpdates.description: Grants permission to list details of the service updates

describeSnapshots.description: Grants permission to list information about cluster or replication group snapshots

describeUpdateActions.description: Grants permission to list details of the update actions for a set of clusters or replication groups

describeUserGroups.description: Grants permission to list information about Redis user groups

describeUsers.description: Grants permission to list information about Redis users

disassociateGlobalReplicationGroup.description: Grants permission to remove a secondary replication group from the global replication group

failoverGlobalReplicationGroup.description: Grants permission to failover the primary region to a selected secondary region of a global replication group

increaseNodeGroupsInGlobalReplicationGro.description: Grants permission to increase the number of node groups in a global replication group

increaseReplicaCount.description: Grants permission to increase the number of replicas in a Redis (cluster mode disabled) replication group or the number of replica nodes in one or more node groups (shards) of a Redis (cluster mode enabled) replication group

listAllowedNodeTypeModifications.description: Grants permission to list available node type that can be used to scale a particular Redis cluster or replication group

listTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list tags for an ElastiCache resource

modifyCacheCluster.description: Grants permission to modify settings for a cluster

modifyCacheParameterGroup.description: Grants permission to modify parameters of a cache parameter group

modifyCacheSubnetGroup.description: Grants permission to modify an existing cache subnet group

modifyGlobalReplicationGroup.description: Grants permission to modify settings for a global replication group

modifyReplicationGroup.description: Grants permission to modify the settings for a replication group

modifyReplicationGroupShardConfiguration.description: Grants permission to add shards, remove shards, or rebalance the keyspaces among existing shards of a replication group

modifyUser.description: Grants permission to change Redis user password(s) and/or access string

modifyUserGroup.description: Grants permission to change list of users that belong to the user group

purchaseReservedCacheNodesOffering.description: Grants permission to purchase a reserved cache node offering

rebalanceSlotsInGlobalReplicationGroup.description: Grants permission to perform a key space rebalance operation to redistribute slots and ensure uniform key distribution across existing shards in a global replication group

rebootCacheCluster.description: Grants permission to reboot some, or all, of the cache nodes within a provisioned cache cluster or replication group (cluster mode disabled)

removeTagsFromResource.description: Grants permission to remove tags from a ElastiCache resource

resetCacheParameterGroup.description: Grants permission to modify parameters of a cache parameter group back to their default values

revokeCacheSecurityGroupIngress.description: Grants permission to remove an EC2 security group ingress from a ElastiCache security group

startMigration.description: Grants permission to start a migration of data from hosted Redis on Amazon EC2 to ElastiCache for Redis

testFailover.description: Grants permission to test automatic failover on a specified node group in a replication group
